thread.title: I-64 bridge restoration over I-195 to affect weekend traffic; expect major delays
thread.title_full: I-64 bridge restoration over I-195 to affect weekend traffic; expect major delays

author: Contributed Report
title: I-64 bridge restoration over I-195 to affect weekend traffic; expect major delays
text: Posted Aug. 5, 2015 at 2:26 PM Updated at 2:26 PM By Contributed Report Posted Aug. 5, 2015 at 2:26 PM RICHMOND — The Virginia Department of Transportation (VDOT) crews continue work to restore the I-64 bridge over I-195 near mile marker 186 near the Bryan Park interchange. Crews will close the ramp from I-64 east to I-95 north (Exit 187) continuously from Friday at 9:30 p.m. to Monday, at 5:30 a.m. Additionally, travel on the ramp from I-195 north to I-95 north will be continuously reduced to one lane during the same timeframe. Drivers should use caution in the area, as crews repair concrete bridge piers during the planned lane closures. Expect delays. Drivers are encouraged to use an alternate route or the posted detours: Detour for closure of I-64 east ramp to I-95 north (Exit 187): From I-64 east, drivers can take Exit 186 to W. Laburnum Ave. (Rt. 197) east to Hermitage Rd. (Rt. 161) south to N. Boulevard back to I-95 north. Alternate routes for through travelers From I-95 south (Chesterfield): • Take Exit 61 to Rt. 10 towards Hopewell to I-295. • Take Exit 67B to Rt. 895 to I-295 (toll) From I-64 east (Goochland/Henrico): There are three alternate routes: • Access Route 288 south at Exit 175 in Goochland to reach Chesterfield County locations and to re-enter I-95 at exit 62 • Access I-295 at Exit 177 to reach I-95 north or I-64 east of Richmond • Access I-195 south at Exit 186 in Richmond to reach downtown destinations, Route 76/Powhite Parkway Extension (toll) through Chesterfield County or the Downtown Expressway (toll). From I-64 west (Henrico): Access I-295 at Exit 200 to reach I-95 north/south or I-64 west of Richmond. The project is expected to be complete by summer 2016. More information on the Interstate 64 bridge restoration project over I-195 is available at i64bridges.org For the latest real-time traffic information or road conditions, call 511 or visit http://www.511virginia.org .
